Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: pay-to-play Runecrafting training

Runecrafting must be unlocked with 5 Sage's Renown. Mid-level Runecrafting can be tedious to train without access to the Last Recall relic.

Skill synergies[edit | edit source]

  • Magic is necessary to use almost all products of the Runecrafting skill.
  • Mining is useful for collecting pure essence.
  • Slayer offers an alternative source of pure essence through certain creatures such as skeletal wyverns.

Set effects and fragments[edit | edit source]

Fragments[edit | edit source]

Fragment Level Description
Rooty Tooty 2x Runeys 1 Each time a rune is crafted, there is a 20% chance to get double the amount of runes.
2 Each time a rune is crafted, there is a 40% chance to get double the amount of runes.
3 Each time a rune is crafted, there is a 80% chance to get double the amount of runes.
Rune Escape 1 When crafting runes at ZMI, you no longer craft mind runes.
2 When crafting runes at ZMI, you no longer craft mind nor body runes.
3 When crafting runes at ZMI, you no longer craft mind, body nor elemental runes.

Set effects[edit | edit source]

Set Effect Description Required Fragments Related Fragments
Last Recall You gain an item that allows you to teleport back to the location where your most recent teleport occurred outside of an instance. 4 Unholy Warrior

Tasks[edit | edit source]

Name Task Requirements Comp%
Beginner
Visit the Rune Essence Mine Visit the Rune Essence Mine. N/A 84%
Craft an Air Rune Craft an air rune at the Air Altar. 1 Runecraft 74%
Easy
Craft Any Rune Use a Runecrafting Altar to craft any type of rune. N/A 77%
Locate a Runecrafting Altar With a Talisman Use any talisman to check the location of a Runecrafting Altar. N/A 75%
Craft 50 Water Runes Craft 50 Water Runes at the Water Altar. 5 Runecraft 56%
Craft a Fire Rune Craft a Fire Rune at the Fire Altar. 14 Runecraft 56%
Use the Abyss Use the Abyss to access a Runecrafting Altar. Enter the Abyss 60%
Medium
Craft 200 Essence Into Runes Use Runecrafting Altars to craft 200 essence into runes of any type. N/A 61%
Craft 4 Runes With 1 Essence Use a Runecrafting Altar to craft 4 of any type of rune using a single essence. 33 Runecraft 56%
Craft Any Combination Rune Use a Runecrafting Altar to craft any type of combination rune. 6 Runecraft 47%
Craft 50 Cosmic Runes Craft 50 Cosmic Runes at the Cosmic Altar. 27 Runecraft
Requires completion of Lost City 		51%
Craft 50 Death Runes Craft 50 death runes at the Death Altar. 65 Runecraft
Requires completion of Mourning's End Part II 		29%
Craft 50 Nature Runes Craft 50 Nature Runes at the Nature Altar. 44 Runecraft 50%
Craft a Body Rune Craft a body rune at the Body Altar. 20 Runecraft 51%
Craft a Lava Rune at the Fire Altar Craft a Lava Rune at the Fire Altar. 23 Runecraft 40%
Fill a Large Pouch Fill a Large Pouch with Essence. 50 Runecraft (not boostable) 28%
Craft a Chaos Rune using a Chaos Core Craft a Chaos Rune using a Chaos Core. 35 Runecraft
Requires completion of Below Ice Mountain 		5.0%
Hard
Craft 2500 Essence Into Runes Use Runecrafting Altars to craft 2500 essence into runes of any type. N/A 34%
Craft 50 Astral Runes Craft 50 astral runes at the Astral Altar. 40 Runecraft
Requires completion of Lunar Diplomacy 		43%
Craft 50 Law Runes Craft 50 law runes at the Law Altar. 54 Runecraft
Requires completion of Troll Stronghold 		42%
Craft a Rune Using Daeyalt Essence Craft any rune using Daeyalt Essence. 60 Mining
Requires completion of Sins of the Father 		43%
Fill a Giant Pouch Fill a giant pouch with Essence. 75 Runecraft (not boostable) 14%
Elite
Reach Level 99 Runecraft Reach level 99 in your Runecraft skill. 99 Runecraft 7.6%
Obtain 25 Million Runecraft XP Obtain 25 million experience in your Runecraft skill. 99 Runecraft 0.2%

Quests[edit | edit source]

Main article: Quest experience rewards Runecrafting
  • Enter the Abyss has no skill requirements and awards 1,000 base experience - enough to skip to level 20.
  • With Construction, Magic and either Firemaking or Woodcutting unlocked, The Eyes of Glouphrie may be completed for 6,000 base experience - enough to skip from level 1 to 37.
  • What Lies Below only requires 35 Runecrafting and Rune Mysteries. It awards 8,000 base experience - enough to skip from level 35 to 45. With the preceding two experience rewards, you can reach level 46 Runecrafting having never trained the skill conventionally.
  • Sins of the Father provides access to Daeyalt essence for 50% more Runecrafting experience per essence used.
